nav.div: Canastota Central School District » District » Coronavirus Updates » Student Support During School Closure

td.style: text-align: center; width: 100%; vertical-align: middle; background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242);

h3.a:
COVID-19 Resource Website
Information for students, parents and teachers.

td.a: Click here to visit the site.

br.br:
Our instructional staff is eager to support our students during this extended school closure. Please use the information below to contact our teachers to ask questions about content, lessons or learning from home.
Junior/Senior High School
Staff are available by email and are also conducting office hours during the day.
Please click here to view an online Google Meet schedule for students.
Please click here for contact information and a listing of availability by teacher.
Please click here for a staff directory.
Roberts Street Elementary School
Staff are available by email. Please click here for a staff directory.
South Side Elementary
School Staff are available by email. Please click here for a staff directory.
Peterboro Street Elementary School
Staff are available by email. Please click here for a staff directory. Please contact our administration if we can help support our students and their families.
Please visit the Village of Canastota COVID-19 Resource Page for information and support.
Technology Support
If your family does not have access to the internet:
8 mobile hotspots can be signed out to students with no access; email cretrosi@canastotacsd.org to request a mobile hotspot
For Raider 1:1 Chromebook support, please contact Tech support directly:
Email tech support: tech@canastotacsd.org
Phone: 315.697.6310
Create a student help ticket

div.div: 120 Roberts Street, Canastota, NY 13032 | Phone 315-697-2025 | Fax 315-697-6368
